title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 390.1 - Application

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided, this Part applies to service contracts (as defined in section 7902[k] of the Insurance Law) marketed, issued, sold or offered for sale, made or offered to be made, or administered in this State, on and after January 15, 1998. This Part and article 79 do not apply to warranties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
390.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
